desc: A recording of various animals in their natural habitats, featuring elephants, tigers, and lions.

sttData.content: Elephants, with their large size and distinctive trunks, roam the African savanna.
Tigers, the largest of all big cats, can be found in Asia.
Lions, the king of the jungle, are the second largest of the big cats.
Several other animals in the wild, like giraffes and zebras, can be heard in the background.
The sounds of nature, like rustling leaves and chirping birds, fill the air.

stt.sttSummary: This audio recording showcases various animals in their natural habitats, including elephants, tigers, and lions, as well as other animals like giraffes and zebras, and the sounds of nature.
